cat.name: Whiskers
cat.description: Whiskers is a fluffy Persian cat with soft white fur and large blue eyes. She enjoys lounging around the house and being pampered.

cat.name: Shadow
cat.description: Shadow is a large Maine Coon with sleek grey fur. He's curious and loves to explore new places, often climbing up high places in the house.

cat.name: Chester
cat.description: Chester is an energetic tabby with a playful spirit. He loves running around the house and playing with toys.

cat.name: Luna
cat.description: Luna is a beautiful Siamese cat with striking blue eyes and a sleek coat. She's very vocal and loves to be the center of attention.
